title: Rev. Al Sharpton interview
itunes:title: Rev. Al Sharpton interview
description:
Today on the show we had Rev Al Sharpton stop by to speak on heroes of the social justice movement, Whoopi Goldberg, Joe Rogan and much more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Nun who got a year in prison for stealing $835,000 from school for gambling and Angela helped some listeners for "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
